synopsis.text: Pagoda-chased since childhood for his unique "ice and fire" physique, Nian Bing finds solace in the culinary world of magic under the tutelage of the legendary "Demon Chef" Zha Ji. After a daring escape from the clutches of the Ice God Pagoda, Nian Bing's journey takes him to Icy City, where he hones his cooking skills and uncovers the true power of his magical heritage. But as his potential grows, so do the dangers that lurk around him. Can Nian Bing balance his quest for vengeance against his parents' killer, the Ice Lord, and his newfound passion for culinary magic, all while striving to become the greatest mage on the Yangguang Continent? Join Nian Bing as he stirs up a storm in this action-packed, magical cooking adventure!
